By  Rachel ScamanMay  

Alan Rosenbaum Faculty Senate president and University Council executive secretary hopes to get someone interested in the executive secretary position which he will step down from next year PERIOD

Rosenbaum was elected for his fifth year as University Council executive secretary at its Wednesday meeting PERIOD He was nominated by the Faculty Senate and was elected by the University Council PERIOD He said by joining the University Council and becoming executive secretary hes become much more familiar with faculty members colleges deans the vice presidents and the administrators PERIOD

Ive been able to get a much more indepth view of how the university functions and the different people that are involved in making the decisions and running the university Rosenbaum said PERIOD

Rosenbaum said prior to his appointment most of his daily interaction was restricted to fellow professors PERIOD

You see the world and the university from the prospective of being in one department but youre not really familiar with the workings of the university Rosenbaum said PERIOD

During his four years as executive secretary Rosenbaum tried to make the Faculty Senate more vital and involved in the governance of the university PERIOD

What I have tried to do in my role is to get the faculty to be more active in fulfilling its role in the shared governance process Rosenbaum said PERIOD

During the time as executive secretary Rosenbaum said he has increased the voice of the faculty PERIOD

The Resources Space and Budgets Committee now meets regularly with the president and this is not something that has been done in the past Rosenbaum said PERIOD

Rosenbaum said the University Advisory Committee to the Board of Trustees now meets regularly with the president as well PERIOD

We are advancing the role of the faculty in the shared governance process and increasing communications with the faculty by developing Faculty Matters which is our newsletter that is now published several times a semester Rosenbaum said PERIOD

Rosenbaum will remain executive secretary until July  PERIOD He said the executive secretary of University Council and the president of the Faculty Senate are the same thing PERIOD

As president of the Faculty Senate I chair the senate and serve as the liaison between the Faculty Senate and the administration Rosenbaum said PERIOD

Rosenbaum said the Faculty Senate president is the representative of the faculty to the administration and the Board of Trustees PERIOD

The executives secretarys job is to set the agenda for the University Council in consultation with the Steering Committee PERIOD

The executive secretary and the Steering Committee meet once a month and uses the Steering Committee and a consult in developing the agenda for the University Council Rosenbaum said PERIOD

James Zanayed Student Association Senate speaker said working with Rosenbaum has been great PERIOD Zanayed said he is focused on helping the students and faculty PERIOD

He really cares about the shared governance process which is a big part of this organization Zanayed said PERIOD

Mike Theodore Student Association chief of staff said Rosenbaum gives honest feedback PERIOD

If you want to communicate with him hell be completely honest and open Theodore said PERIOD

Zanayed said Rosenbaum has worked on many things to improve the university like helping support a new and improved Recreation Center PERIOD

Rosenbaum was also the cochair of the Presidential Search Advisory Committee which selected Doug Baker to be the new university president PERIOD

Rosenbaum has been a faculty member for  years PERIOD
